Just then a proto-form came online.  But all of a sudden the spark was 
overtaken and went forever offline replaced by a black spark (if 
you've red most of my posts this may sound familar).  The chip of the 
predicon only makes it blacker.  It becomes less powerful, but far 
more evil than it's ocunterpart.  And it feels a thirst for power 100 
fold his so great he can suck the power out of other bots, primarily 
ones like himself.

OOC: I skimmed it so if the ship is crashing or already crashed ignore 
this next part.

BIC:  He instantly gets lost in rage and begins pulling circuits and 
smashing everything in an attempt to get to the same planet as his 
counterpart (hey we have to crash on Earth don't we).  He heads for 
the control room and hurls a piece of metal he pulled off his stasis 
pod at the main control panel.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
> OOC:  Well, I am going to use Sadistacons(LN came up with it) as my 
> faction name and Sacrilege Plague(I came up with it) as my ship 
> name.  Hope you like the names. 
> 
> BIC:  A Leopard spot male Bot and a black female bot with a red back 
> covered with black polkadots are sitting around a table in the mess 
> hall of the Sacrilege Plague.  They are both enjoying a drink of 
> Liquid Energon and talking.
> 
>    "So Lady Right, you let them go?"  Said the Leopard print bot.
> 
>    "Yeah Lepord, But a day later I found them and kind of blew them 
> up,"  Says Lady Right.
> 
>    "WOW, that is so cool,"  Says Lepord, "The coolest kill I ever 
got 
> was shooting 5 people with one shot."
> 
>    Just then Snake Eyes message came through the Comm. Unit.
> 
>    "Hey Lady Right lets go to the bridge."  says Lapord as he puts 
> down his liquid energon drink on the table and stands up.
> 
>    "Just wait kid, wait until we finish out drink."  Lady Eyes says 
> as she takes another drink of her liquid energon.
> 
>    Lepord sits back down and starts to chug his drink.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   ^^^^^^^^^   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> Lobstruck sit in his enlarged room.  He is basically a red bot with 
> what seems like bumbs all over his shoulders.  He walks over to a 
lab 
> table with thuds of clang where he steps.  He starts to mix some 
> elements when Snake Eyes message comes through.  He places his 
> elements where they belong and he starts to walk towards the bridge. 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
> >    A black ship with blood red tinted windows slowly crawls 
through 
> > space.  On board is the ship are enough supplies for a small 
> > invasion.  Infact,  that is what this ship is going to do.  In the 
> > bridge are many Cybertron Bots.  They all happen to have a 
Predacon 
> > Symbol on their shoulder.  In the biggest chair, located in the 
> > middle of the bridge, is occipied by a large green bot.
> >    
> >    The bot looks around the bridge.  When the bots eyes looks all 
> the 
> > way to the left, the bot says, "Kan Kick, are you asleep?"
> > 
> >    A lightly tan bot, whos legs are up on his console and his head 
> is 
> > leaning to the side quickly sits upright while he rubs his 
> eyes, "No, 
> > I was wide awake."
> > 
> >    The bot starts to laugh and says, "Don't lie, it's not nice."  
> THe 
> > bot then looks behind him and to the right, "Snake eyes, come 
here."
> > 
> >    The bot he was looking at, who is very thin(For a BW bot), 
> stands 
> > up and walks towards the bot.  His feet echo against the plating 
as 
> > he comes forward, "Yessh Sshir?"
> > 
> >    "Send out a Communication message to all the members of the 
crew 
> > to come to the bridge."  The green bot says as he looks at a 
smudge 
> > on his right arm rest of his chair, "Ohh and tell Lady Right that 
> > next time she cleans my chair she needs to make sure there are no 
> > smudges."
> > 
> >    "Yessh Sshir."  Snake Eyes says as he walks back to his console 
> > and the ground echo behing him.  When Snake Eyes get back to his 
> > console he sends out a Communication message to the whole ship 
that 
> > can be heard by everybot on the ship, "Hello, thissh issh Sshnake 
> > Eyessh,  Commander UltraByte hassh asshk me to sshend and 
> > Communication messhsshage to tell all of you to get you metalic 
> > tailpipe up in the bridge. Pleasshe."
